source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT	[GroupName] AS [Group Name]
			,ISNULL([Subgroup],'-') AS [Subgroup]
			,[Members] AS [New Members]
			,[Admins] AS [New Admins]
			,[ActiveVols] AS [Active Vols]
			,[NonMemberVols] AS [Non-Member Vols]
			,[YotiIDs] AS [New Yotis]
			,ISNULL([OtherCredentials],0) AS [New Non-Yoti Credentials]
			,[Requests] AS [New Requests]
			,[Jobs] AS [New Jobs]
			,[Jobs_Cancelled] AS [% New Jobs Cancelled]
			,[Jobs_Completed] AS [% New Jobs Completed]
			,[Jobs_Overdue] AS [% New Jobs Overdue]
			,[TopActivities] AS [Top Activities]
	FROM	[Analysis].[viewMonthlyStats_MonthToDate]
select r.ID, r.ReferringGroupId from [Request].[Request] r

SELECT a.[Id], a.[PostcodeId], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[LastUpdated],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[AddressDetail] a

SELECT a.[Id], a.[Name], a.[ShortName], a.[AddressLine1],a.[AddressLine2], a.[AddressLine3],a.[Locality],a.[PostCode],a.Latitude, a.Longitude, a.Instructions,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Address].[Location] a

SELECT a.[Id],a.[Postcode],a.[LastUpdated],a.[Latitude],a.[Longitude],a.[FriendlyName],a.[IsActive],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM [Address].[Postcode] a
SELECT a.[Id],a.[Postcode],a.CompressedNearestPostcodes,CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM [Address].[PreComputedNearestPostcodes] a
SELECT a.[SupportActivityId], a.[AutoSignUpWhenOtherSelected],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Configuration].[SupportActivity] a

SELECT a.[ID],a.[FeedbackDate],a.[JobId],a.[UserId],a.[RequestRoleTypeID],a.[FeedbackRatingTypeID],CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM [Feedback].[Feedback] a
select r.GroupID, r.ActivityID, r.CredentialSetID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[ActivityCredentialSet] r
select r.ID, r.Name, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Credential] r
select r.ID, r.GroupID,r.CredentialID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[CredentialSet] r
select r.ID, r.GroupName, r.ParentGroupId, r.GroupKey, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[Group] r

select r.GroupID, r.CredentialID, r.CredentialTypeID,r.Name, r.HowToAchieve, r.DisplayOrder, r.CredentialVerifiedByID, r.HowToAchieve_CTA_Destination, r.WhatIsThis, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupCredential] r
select r.GroupID, r.[Configuration], r.CommunicationJobTypeID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupEmailConfiguration] r
select r.GroupID, r.LocationID, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupLocation] r
select r.GroupID, r.[MapLocationID], r.Latitude, r.Longitude, r.ZoomLevel, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupMapDetails] r

select r.GroupID, r.SupportActivityID, r.SupportActivityInstructionsID, r.Radius, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[GroupSupportActivityConfiguration] r

select r.GroupID, r.NewRequestNotificationStrategyId, 
r.MaxVolunteer, CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[NewRequestNotificationStrategy] r

select r.GroupID, r.[FirstName], r.[LastName], r.[AddressLine1], r.[AddressLine2], r.[AddressLine3], r.[Locality], r.[Postcode], r.[EmailAddress], r.[MobilePhone], r.[OtherPhone], 
CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION 
from [Group].[RequestorDetails] r
select r.GroupID, r.AllowAutonomousJoinersAndLeavers,  CHANGE_TRACKING_CURRENT_VERSION() as SYS_CHANGE_VERSION, 'I' as SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION from [Group].[SecurityConfiguration] r
